content: simple and quick to knit in your favourite dk yarn the brunswick beanie is a snuggly head hugging winter hat designed to fit a wide range of heads the pattern includes four different sizes worked in super stretchy 1x1 ribbing which means that sizing is very flexible **unstretched measures ** 32 /36 /40 /44cm 12 5 /14 /15 5 /17 **stretched measures up to ** 46 /50 /56 /61cm 18 /20 /22 /24 **samples shown in tarndie polwarth ** small shearer s bluey medium plonk large dark brown extra large fatigues *the brunswick beanie was cast on at wool gathering 2017 where we decided to make warm hats scarves and mitts for people facing winter without a place to live * *feel free to use this pattern to offer warmth and comfort to those who need it * please see the wool gathering group 1 for more information about the *make winter warm for others cal/kal* including where to send your knitted gifts *dark colours preferred for the cal/kal - no brights please * 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/wool-gathering-australia/3624403/26-50#47
